Package hu.bme.mit.theta.common.table

Class BasicTableWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.bme.mit.theta.common.table.BasicTableWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TableWriter
    public final class BasicTableWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements TableWriter
    A simple table writer that prints tables to a PrintStream using an arbitrary delimeter and a cell pre/postfix.

    For exemple in ordinary CSV files, the delimeter is ',' and the pre/postfix is '"'.
